title: Deposits lag credit growth as savers look for higher returns elsewhere
description: Deposit growth had fallen from a peak of 18% in fiscal ended March 2020 to 10% in March 2022 as savers looked for better returns after a sharp fall in deposit rates due to the extraordinary interest rate cuts by RBI post-Covid. Though subsequent rate hikes have improved deposit growth, it is still low at 14% compared to its peak.
